title: Manage a Group Ticket Sale
description: A school group wants to purchase 50 tickets for a matinee theater performance.

tasks.description: Confirm availability of a 50-seat block for the requested performance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an available block of 50 seats in the mezzanine.

tasks.description: Apply the standard school group discount to the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent applies a 15% discount to the tickets.

tasks.description: Generate an invoice for the school to pay via purchase order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and sends an invoice for the discounted total.

tasks.description: Place the 50 seats on hold pending payment of the invoice.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reserves the seats and sets a payment deadline.
